hypothesis_content.title: Supply Shock Delayed Reaction
hypothesis_content.statement: When a significant supply reduction catalyst (e.g., Ethereum burn rate spike >200% of average) occurs during neutral/negative sentiment, price reaction is delayed 2-3 days as market focuses on short-term flows before recognizing structural change.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Structural supply changes have delayed impact as market initially focuses on liquidity flows. Once short-term noise clears, the fundamental shift becomes priced in.
entry_conditions: Supply metric extreme (burn rate, exchange outflow, illiquid supply change) >2σ event
Sentiment indicator (Crypto Fear & Greed, social volume) shows neutral or negative reading
Price fails to react meaningfully (<1% move) within 24 hours of catalyst
On-chain momentum (SOPR, MVRV) shows accumulation pattern

exit_conditions.take_profit: 6% move in favor of supply shock direction
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Break of key support/resistance level invalidating thesis

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Supply shock immediately priced in (>3% move within 12 hours), or never materializes in price action.
